class.name: ros2_control_demo_hardware/RRBotSystemPositionOnlyHardware
class.description: The ROS2 Control minimal robot protocol. This is example for start porting the robot from ROS 1.

class.name: ros2_control_demo_hardware/RRBotSystemMultiInterfaceHardware
class.description: The ROS2 Control minimal robot protocol for a system with multiple command and state interfaces.

class.name: ros2_control_demo_hardware/DiffBotSystemHardware
class.description: The ros2_control DiffBot example using a system hardware interface-type. It uses velocity command and position state interface. The example is the starting point to implement a hardware interface for differential-drive mobile robots.

class.name: ros2_control_demo_hardware/RRBotSystemWithSensorHardware
class.description: The ros2_control RRBot example using a system hardware interface-type and only one command and state interface. This example is the starting point to implement a hardware interface for robots with sensors providing one communication path.
